text: Nuke the site from the orbit. It's the only way to be sure

I would enjoy a tool that provides a comprehensive look / document / json / whatever from all the dependencies found in design manager, afaik right now you have to do it file by file and then audit the dependents if they are actually critical

Since you can't really just move stuff around so mostly housekeeping would be deleting old stuff, but if your portal is sprawling with all kinds of detritus from several years it's quite a chore to sift through all of it.
<@UD53A9UUR>, perhaps something like be able to filter "last used date", or "file size", search for any potential "duplicates", etc. Do you know if that exists?
i dont know of a tool.  i was mainly curious as it does seem like a useful feature.
